title: AAEON launches palm-sized UP 7000 Edge with N-Series processors
description: AAEON has introduced the UP 7000 Edge, a Mini-PC that accommodates the entire spectrum of embedded Intel Processor N-series CPUs. This compact and versatile device offers compatibility with both Windows 10 LTSC 2021 and Linux Ubuntu 22.04. The UP 7000 Edge Mini PC offers a range of N-series Processors, including: N50 — 2C, (1.0 – […]
